text: Arthur Donald Spatt (December 13, 1925 â€“ June 12, 2020) was an American politician and judge. Spatt was the United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of New York from 1989 to 2004. He was born in New York City. Spatt was nominated by President George H. W. Bush. Spatt died on June 12, 2020 in Commack, New York from blood cancer, aged 94. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from blood cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York (state) Category:American judges Category:Politicians from New York City
title: Arthur Donald Spatt
